text: piṉṉar (marakkalattiliruntu iṟaṅki) iruvarum vaḻi naṭakkalāṉārkaḷ; (vaḻiyil) oru paiyaṉai avviruvarum cantitta pōtu, avar avaṉaik koṉṟu viṭṭār. (Uṭaṉē mūsā)"kolaikkuṟṟamiṉṟi, paricuttamāṉa jīvaṉaik koṉṟuviṭṭīrkaḷē? Niccayamāka nīṅkaḷ peruttak kēṭāṉa oru kāriyattaiyē ceytu viṭṭīrkaḷ!" Eṉṟu (mūsā) kūṟiṉār
